## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 23,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | This quantity ensures sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand (including a margin of error) while utilizing the available vendor order quantity options for efficiency. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  This order size is 7,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase, allowing for a more conservative approach towards covering potential demand variability. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  3.8 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  5.5 days                                |
| Comments                          |  While the player's planned order size of 16,000 units would have met the immediate demand, it would leave very little room for error. By ordering 23,000 units, we can confidently cover the forecasted demand and minimize the risk of stockouts, potentially resulting in higher sales and improved customer satisfaction. Additionally, this recommendation takes advantage of the available vendor order quantity options, ensuring efficient utilization of resources. |
